text: Milagrosa Tan (1957/1958 â€“ 30 November 2019) was a Filipina politician. She was the Governor of Samar from 2001 through 2010 and again from June 2019 through her death. She was the first female governor of the province. She was a member of the House of Representatives of the Philippines. Tan died at a hospital in Taguig from cardiac arrest on 30 November 2019, aged 61. ==References== ==Other websites== *Province of Samar Category:1950s births Category:2019 deaths Category:Politicians from Eastern Visayas
title: Milagrosa Tan
